txt.en:
'The relics of Cardolan can fetch a nifty price from the well-to-do in Bree-town. Since we are here, I thought I might offer you a little deal. 

'If you collect these relics over the course of your travel, I will trade you materials that may be of great use to you.

'Is this acceptable?'
'These will sell nicely, and I owe you much. Here, this should be a fair trade and if you find otherwise, you know where I can be found.'
'Any of the creatures here in the southern Barrow-downs could have an artifact of Cardolan, either on their person or in their bellies.'

Cardolan, once the ruling kingdom in the area of the southern Barrow-downs, left behind many relics. The creatures of the southern Barrow-downs likely carry some of these relics if one looks for them.
Bring the relics to Edith Sweetrose

Any of the creatures in the southern Barrow-downs may carry trinkets and relics from the kingdom of Cardolan.

Edith Sweetrose will trade crafting materials for any relics of Cardolan you may find.

<rgb=#FF0000>NOTE: Bounty quests are repeatable quests, but have a finite number of completions. This quest can be completed three times.</rgb>
